What We Do

Landscaping Services in Greenville, SC

From routine lawn maintenance to full yard transformations — we handle it all with reliable, high-quality work.

Lawn Maintenance

Regular mowing, edging, and cleanup to keep your lawn looking sharp all season.

Mulching

Fresh mulch beds that suppress weeds, retain moisture, and give your yard a polished look.

Bed Edging

Crisp, clean edges that define your beds and give your landscape a finished, professional appearance.

Shrub Trimming

Shaped shrubs and hedges that frame your home and improve curb appeal.

Yard Cleanups

Full-property cleanups that remove leaves, debris, and overgrowth so your yard looks its best.

Seasonal Work

Spring and fall prep services to get your yard ready for the season ahead.

Patios

Custom paver and stone patio installations that extend your living space outdoors.

Outdoor Kitchens

Built-in outdoor kitchen setups designed for how you actually entertain.

How It Works

Getting Started Is Simple

Three easy steps to a yard you are proud of.

01

Request a Free Quote

Call, text, or fill out the form on this site. Tell us what you need and where you are — we respond fast.

02

Get Your Custom Plan

We come out, look at the property, and give you a clear estimate. No guesswork, no hidden fees.

03

We Get It Done

We show up when we say we will and do the job right. Clean work, every time — and we haul away the debris.
